title: Can we change some things to make league more colourblind friendly
body:
after reading another patch notes I felt I might as well try here and ask about the colour of the text in the notes where something has been changed and new values implemented the old values are in red i believe and unfortunately it is impossible for me to read what it says i was just wondering if it would be possible to change the colour to a slightly lighter colour which is visible on the client background 

there are some stretch goals with this post if it is successful (cursor visibility) and (Justicar Syndra) but for now a change in some text would be much appreciated

replies.body: Are you referring to the ability effects that were removed on a specific champion ability in the Patch 6.20 notes?

i am referring to all the changes in all the patch notes where it shows the old numbers of a changed ability which are in a darker colour before the new numbers for the given ability it is not specific to one change

i accidentally replied as a comment oops

Gotcha! I've passed this feedback to the team that pushes out the patch notes. I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention. ^.^

I saw that you had a few other concerns about other elements in the game being potentially problematic. For consistencies' sake, can you write up a tidy post of all the elements you were concerned about and post it to [*Miscellaneous*](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) where general feedback goes? Once you've done that, can you toss me a link to it in a reply? Thank you!
